article_title: PPACA drug coverage may lower retirement savings targets
article_text:
Those putting money away for retirement may not need to save quite so much, partly thanks to the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and its provisions for prescription drug coverage.

That was the news in a report containing updated computer modeling by the Employee Benefit Research Institute of retiree health savings needs, which found that savings targets fell between 2 percent and 10 percent between 2013‒2014.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Marlene Y. Satter
article_metadata.description: Computer modeling of retiree health savings needs found that savings targets fell between 2 percent and 10 percent between 2013‒2014.
